Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in the portfolio.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

description.description: A brief description of the project.

videoUrl.description: URL of the project's video (if applicable).

videoPosterUrl.description: URL for the video's poster image.

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the project is featured on the homepage.

order.description: The order in which the project will be displayed.

isVisible.description: Controls the visibility of the project on the public portfolio.

ContactInfo.title: Contact Info
ContactInfo.description: Stores contact information for the portfolio owner.

logoUrl.description: URL for the main site logo.

HomePageSettings.title: Home Page Settings
HomePageSettings.description: Stores settings for the homepage, like background videos.

homePageBackgroundVideoId.description: The ID of the project to use for the homepage background video.

websiteBackgroundVideoId.description: The ID of the project to use for the sitewide background video.

isHomePageVideoEnabled.description: Controls whether the homepage video background is enabled.

isWebsiteVideoEnabled.description: Controls whether the video background for other pages is enabled.

AboutPageContent.title: About Page Content
AboutPageContent.description: Stores the editable content for the About Us page.

title.description: The main heading for the about section.

content.description: The paragraph content for the about section.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the about section.

logoUrl.description: URL of the logo for the about section.

MediaAsset.title: Media Asset
MediaAsset.description: Stores metadata about an uploaded media file.

url.description: The secure URL of the uploaded file.

resource_type.description: The type of the media file.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents an administrator user in the system.

uid.description: The unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

permissions.description: Granular permissions for the admin user.

canUploadMedia.description: Whether the user can upload new media files.

canDeleteMedia.description: Whether the user can delete existing media files.

canEditProjects.description: Whether the user can edit portfolio projects.

canEditAbout.description: Whether the user can edit the about page.

canEditContact.description: Whether the user can edit contact page settings.

canEditHome.description: Whether the user can edit home page settings.

order.description: The order in which the client will be displayed.

isVisible.description: Controls the visibility of the client on the public about page.

params.name: settingsId
params.description: The unique identifier for the homepage settings document.

definition.description: Stores the content for the About Us page.
